answers.answer: I am almost 14 weeks and i am high risk already. My blood pressure is super high and i have heard the doctors already talking about preeclampsia :-( i was high risk with my other two but nowhere near this early. I feel your pain :-( hang in there :-)

Im high risk due to previous miscarriage, High blood pressure not related to pregnancy(I had preeclampsia with my first) and Im bipolar. Its been battle but, im almost 35 weeks almost there. Hang in there hun, it will be worth it in the end!

I am at high risk with  this  pregancy,  i was with my 1st child, i had preeclampsia  with her and was induced.so far they  been checking me all this  pregancy  i am 35 weeks and has been good. With her was towards the end at 37 weeks was induced for high blood pressure and protein  in my urine. Good luck  mommies

I am baby #1 I had to have a csec because I don't produce the right hormones to dilate baby #2 Gestational hypertension baby #3 tested positive for Trisomy 18 so with the last two I have been. All my paperwork says I'm high risk because of prior csec?? I guess because of the Rick of uterine rupture?

I'm 27 ftm 27 almost 28 weeks along high risk due to my weight and high blood pressure my blood pressure has been somewhat controlled with meds and no protein in urine hoping to stay that way haven't been diagnosed with gd 1st test was good hoping next test is the same next appointment in about two weeks it is stressful but I keep thinking about all the good stuff they say at my check ups and try not to think so much on the what ifs so just hang in there it's almost to the end I'm hoping not to have to be induced or have a c section

I'm 31 weeks and 4 days. 2nd pregnancy.  High risk due to preeclampsia and failing placenta.  I am on hospitalized bed rest for as long as the baby is getting enough to grow.  Had severe preeclampsia with #1. Born at 30wks.  Had a bo of 205/115. After 3 days of hospitalization and receiving 2 steroid injections.  I had a emergency csection.  Prayers for all you high risk mommas. The end is in sight.  Missing my todder, husband and normal food.

Wow u and I have similar cases I mc at 19 wks with first pregnancy for pregnant again found out I have a incompitent cervix I needed a cerclauge at 15 wks no sex no nothing since I'm 22 wks that's already high risk and i have gestational diabetes also is another risk. /: its so tough !!! I know your pain I can't wait. My baby weights a pound .
I'm a high risk because part of my heart doesn't work right.... I just hope my little man doesn't have this issue that I have!! I know I have more test done.... I'm am currently 30 weeks today!!!

I'm high risk due to low blood pressure, I have vasovagal. Plus had hyperemesis in the beginning of my pregnancy and was on iv fluids for a month and a half. This was a much more difficult pregnancy than my first which was almost perfect in a sense that there was little sickness, little pain. I even went camping and slept in a tent at 8.5 months pregnant. Now I'm almost 36 weeks and I'm so over everything.

question: So I'm 23 weeks pregnant now and this pregnancy has been high risk since the beginning because I lost my first daughter hours after birth at 21 weeks and I have gd with my current pregnancy. I appreciate the precautions my doctors are taking this time around but man all the testing, appointments, blood work, etc. starts to take its toll, you know? I think the only positive of my high risk experience has been all of the sonograms. I have so many of my little girl already (we're having another girl) I bought a photo album for them today because I know I'll have more. I just keep telling myself 16 more weeks (they plan to induce me at 39 weeks if I make it that long)
title: Any high risk moms?
